name: atomic-nethernet
description: Atomic Nethernet is a Node.JS implementation of the Nethernet protocol for Minecraft Bedrock.

scripts.release: bun tsc || true && git commit -m "Prepare Release" || true && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:full: bun tsc || true && git commit -m "Prepare Release" || true && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Serial-V
